name: Wave Ace
description:
Controls:

  • Movement: WASD, Arrows, Left Stick
  • Shot: Tap Z, Left Ctrl, Left Mouse Button, (A) button.
  • Shot + Slow: Hold Z, Left Ctrl, Left Mouse Button, (A) button
  • Exit: Escape key

Story:

Listen up, Rookie! This is a shooting type game (also known as a shmup) where the main goal is clearing enemy wave patterns as accurately and efficiently as possible. A special check-pointing system will train you up to Ace rank by gradually introducing new wave patterns and making sure you master each one before moving on. It's time to get good!
